| icon           = poe2 ring_signet icon.png
| description    = Vailian diplomats often wear signet rings such as this as symbols of their office. The swift, cutthroat nature of Vailian politics requires maintaining reliable channels of communications between the government, the guilds, and powerful patrons. To this end, emissaries are considered untouchable by all parties.
